title: [HOLD for payment 2024-10-16] [$250] Category rules - Approver field in category editor shows user email instead of user name
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: Precondition:
- Rules is enabled.
- User has custom name.

1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Go to workspace settings > Workflows.
3. Click on the existing approval workflow under Add approvals.
4. Note that Approver field shows user name.
5. Go to workspace settings > Categories.
6. Click on any category.
7. Click Approver.
8. Select a user with custom name.

Expected result: Approver field in category editor will show user name.

Actual result: None
